casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Porter, Appellant.
Argued March 14,1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeboy, Nix and Mandeeino, JJ.
Timothy J. Sullivwn, Jr., Assistant Public Defender, with Mm John J. Dean, Assistant Public Defender, and George H. Boss, Public Defender, for appellant.
Robert L. Eberhardt, Assistant District Attorney, with him Carol Mary Los, Assistant District Attorney, and Robert W. Duggan, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
October 4, 1972:
